menu.pc_msg: Determine whether to jump to computer version?

login.msg1: The login password cannot be empty.
login.msg5: If you have forgotten your password, please press the reset button on your machine to reset it. The default password is admin.
login.msg7: Are you sure you want to quit?
login.msg9: The login user name cannot be empty.
login.msg10: The login username or password is incorrect.

elink.help: This page is used to set parameters in the Elink.

wifi.help: This page is used to set the basic parameters of wireless network. By setting the basic parameters of wireless network, such as SSID and password, it is easy to set up the wireless network environment.
wifi.help_adv: Use the advanced setting page to make detailed settings for the wireless advanced setting includes items that are not available from the Basic Setting page, such as Beacon Interval, Control Tx Rates and Basic Data Rates.
wifi.help_guest: The guest network is a virtual network. Through the guest network function, users can establish a separate online environment for visitors. It uses a separate Internet access key, which not only avoids the leakage of the user's own Internet key, but also prevents the leakage of user data information, thereby further ensuring the home network. Safety.
wifi.help_wps: This page is for WPS setup and can be quickly connected to the router via WPS.
wifi.prefer_info: When the SSID and encryption information of 5G and 2.4G are the same, give priority to the device to connect to the selected frequency band
wifi.allow_access: Allow guests to access local network
wifi.msg2: Network name(SSID) can only contain the following special character:!@#^&*()+_-={}|:.?
wifi.msg3: Network name(SSID)'s length not more than 32.
wifi.msg5: Password can only contain the following special character:!@#^&*()+_-={}|:.?

wan.help: This page is used to configure the parameters for internet network which connects to the WAN port of your device. Here you may change the access method to DHCP, static IP, PPPoE...

error.msg2: Because your browser version is too low, please use other browsers (such as Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera, etc.) for management
error.msg3: If you don't have another browser, please click "Quick Networking" below to set up the network. After successful networking, we recommend downloading the latest version.

network.help: This page is used to set parameters in the network.
network.msg8: LAN IP cannot be on the same network segment as WAN IP.
network.msg9: to be on the same network segment as the LAN IP.

changepwd.help: This page is used to set the administrator password. For security reasons, it is recommended to change the default password.
changepwd.msg2: The original password you entered is incorrect. Please re-enter.
changepwd.msg3: Original password can't contain Chinese characters. can only contain the following special character:!@#^&*()+_-={}[]|:.?

changepwd.msg9: Usernames are only allowed to contain special characters: !@#^&*()+_-={}[]|:.?

time.help: This page is used to set the system time to synchronize with the Internet time server.
time.ntp8: Atlantic Time, Brazil West, Bolivia, Venezuela
time.ntp12: Gambia, Liberia, Morocco, England, Ireland, Portugal
time.ntp13: Czech Republic, Slovak, Spain, Germany, France, Tunisia
time.ntp15: Iraq, Jordan, Kuwait, Moscow Winter Time
time.msg4: Time server must be a valid IP or a valid URL address.

firmware.local_upgrade_msg: Local upgrade takes about 2 minutes to upload and update the firmware,please wait patiently. Warning! Please do not power or disconnect the network during the upgrade process, otherwise the machine will be damaged.
firmware.cloud_upgrade_msg: Cloud Upgrade, download new firmware upgrade from firmware server.
firmware.upload: The firmware and upgrade are being downloaded ...
firmware.msg4: The correct upgrade file should be no more than {0}, the wrong upgrade file may cause flash damage, please confirm that the correct upgrade file has been selected.

firmware.MM_cloud_fw2flash3: Upgrading the firmware file version is too low, please choose the high version retry.

firmware.MM_flashsize_error: Unable to get Flash size, please restart or check equipment.

firmware.msg11: Please select the slave device that needs to be upgraded first.
firmware.msg12: Waiting for network device to download firmware ...

diagnosis.help: This page is used for Ping diagnosis.
diagnosis.msg3: Please enter the number of Ping.
diagnosis.msg4: The range of the number of Ping is: 1~60.

traceroute.help: This page is used for route tracking. Enter the route tracking command and click [Execute] to implement route tracking.
traceroute.msg1: The route track address cannot be empty
traceroute.msg2: Please enter the domain name or IP address
traceroute.msg3: Please enter the correct domain name or IP address
traceroute.msg4: Please enter the number of route traces.
traceroute.msg5: The range of tracking numbers is: 1~60.

schedule.help: This page is used to set timing restart rules.
schedule.help_wifi: This page is used to set the service time of wireless network. Please confirm NTP work normally at first.
schedule.msg1: The count down time can't be empty.
schedule.msg2: The count down time must be a valid number.
schedule.msg3: The count down time is invalid, range:[1-240]
schedule.msg4: The set count down time is less than the system runtime. Are you sure to restart the device immediately?
schedule.msg5: Please open the NTP time server first, then do the time restart operation.

dmz.help: Some hosts need to provide some application services, such as Web, Mail, FTP and so on, in order to provide better service, but also to effectively protect the security of the internal network. To avoid the application services being directly exposed to external networks and attacked.
dmz.msg3: The IP address of the LAN IP address of your current set up is not in the same segment.
dmz.msg4: The IP address that you set consistent with the current LAN IP address.

vpnpass.help: This page is used to set VPN passthrough.

ddns.help: The Domain name service (DDNS) can be used to bind the domain name to the dynamic IP of the public network, so that users can set up various servers.
ddns.msg2: can't contain Chinese characters. Only allowed to include special characters!@#^&*()+_-={}[]|:.?

qos.help: Intelligent QoS has two modes: intelligent flow control and IP flow control. By setting intelligent QoS rules, the upload and download rate of the network can be controlled.
qos.help1: Common broadband reference values, the actual bandwidth varies from carrier to operator.
qos.help2: By setting {0} rules, the upload and download rate of the network can be controlled.
qos.msg1: The automatic detection result may be lower than the actual bandwidth. Do you want to continue?
qos.msg3: The {0} you set and the {1} in the current rule list have exceeded the total {2} of the settings. Please re-enter.
qos.msg6: Please enable QOS in the settings before proceeding.

rule.help_portfwd: You may set port forwarding to provide services on Internet.
rule.help_static_dhcp: You can bind the associations between them by setting a fixed IP/MAC.
rule.help_ipf: This page is used to set up IP/port filtering, which is used to restrict LAN users from accessing the internet.
rule.help_macf: This page is used to set up MAC address filtering, which is used to restrict LAN users'access to the Internet. When this function is enabled, the MAC added to the list will be prohibited from accessing the Internet through the gateway under the firewall. When this feature is disabled, the rules added to the list do not take effect.
rule.help_urlf: This page is used to set up URL filtering, and URL filtering is used to restrict LAN users'access to the Internet. When enabled, URLs added to the list will be banned by LAN users. When this feature is disabled, the rules added to the list do not take effect.
rule.help_account: This page is used to set up VPN account management.
rule.help_acl: This page is used to set up a wireless black and white list to allow or restrict client access to the wireless network.
rule.help_parental: Parental controls allow you to check your child's online time, limit whether your child can access the Internet, and control your child's online time and access to the Internet outside the set permitted online hours.
rule.help_devices: This page is used to display information about the current client.
rule.not_allow_net: Access to the Internet is not allowed.

syslog.help: This page can be used to show the system log.

remote.help: You can configure remote management of your system.
remote.msg3: The remote management port cannot be the same as the port forwarding external port. Please re-enter.

wizard.isp_info: If your ISP only allows internet access to a specific MAC address, you need to clone the MAC address. If you don't sure, select 'Use default MAC address'.
wizard.static_info: Please fill in the parameters for static IP access.
wizard.ppp_info: Please fill in the username and password by your ISP.

ipv6.help: This page is used to set IPv6 capabilities.

iptv.help: This page is used to set the IPTV.
iptv.msg4: If 802.1Q tags are not used, the VLAN IDs and VLANs of IP-Phone, IPTV, and must have the same priority.
iptv.msg5: Internet VLAN ID needs to be set different from IP-Phone and IPTV VLAN ID.

device.msg1: Please select a device that requires {0}.

opmode.msg1: Are you sure you want to switch to: {0}?

mesh.help: This page is used for Mesh networking settings.
mesh.help_roaming: This page is used for setting the roaming function. The terminal device of the device required for the roaming function also supports the roaming function.
mesh.help_factory: The factory binding function can avoid tedious Mesh networking operations. The Mesh products in the package will automatically form a Mesh network after power-on, and only need to configure the Internet access information. At the same time, this function can enable the product The Mesh network remains after Reset.
mesh.help_set: This page is used to display mesh topology information.
mesh.help_main_config: This page is used to release the factory binding information. The information cannot be restored after the factory binding is released. The device becomes the unpaired master device. Please proceed with caution.
mesh.mesh_warm:
Tip:
1. Suite products, Routers have been Mesh successfully in factory default settings, please click “Next”.
2. Single product, please power on the device, press the "T" button on the Master router after it working normally(the status LED will be green and blinking slowly), then this device will be added to the existing Mesh networking as a Satellite router.
3. If the device does no need to join the existing Mesh networking, please click "Next" directedly.
mesh.mesh_warm_con: Note: mesh networking only supports {0} slave devices.
mesh.meshconecting: in progress(red and orange lights flash alternately)...
mesh.mesh_fail: failed, please confirm whether the device that currently requires mesh is powered on.
mesh.lift_bound_main: Unbind the main device from the factory.
mesh.auto_tips: The factory will be restored from the device, click the "Start" button on the main device to complete the network operation automatically.
mesh.lift_main_msg:
Note: It is not recommended to remove the factory binding. This button will remove the existing Mesh products in the current Mesh network from factory binding. After lifting, it will have the following effects: 
1, the main device and the list Slave devices will be reset, and the mesh cannot be automatically re-set after reset. 
2 After reset, all configuration information including Mesh network information will be deleted. 
3, after unbinding, manual mesh networking will be required, without affecting The function of Mesh itself. 
4, This function is an irreversible function. After unbinding, the master device and the slave devices in the list cannot be factory bound again.
mesh.lift_msg:
Note: It is not recommended to remove the factory binding. This button will release the device from factory binding. After the removal, it will have the following effects: 
1, the device will be reset, and it cannot be automatically meshed again after reset. . 
2, after reset, all configuration information including Mesh network information will be deleted. 
3, after unbinding, manual mesh networking will be required, which will not affect the function of Mesh itself. 
4, this function is irreversible, After unbundling, the device cannot be factory bound again with other devices.
mesh.signal_info: Note: If the signal strength is "Low", the mesh connection may be disconnected or unstable on the networking equipment. Please adjust to a suitable position so that the mesh networking signal is at "Medium" or "High", this kind of Internet experience will be better.
mesh.msg1: Are you sure you want to switch to: {0}?
